about_the_game:
‘Corsairs Legacy: Naval Mission - Pirate Action RPG’ is an immersive pirate game that will take you to the golden age of piracy in the Caribbean. Play as a pirate captain and command your crew through a variety of exciting ground and sea battles, while experiencing an engaging story driven by characters from the original Corsairs Legacy game and its sequel.

With historically accurate ships, weapons, and tactics, the game provides an authentic and immersive experience of pirate life in the 17th and 18th centuries. Experience the thrill of ground and sea battles, treasure hunting, and more as you progress through the game's story-driven adventure.

Game features:

- naval battles: boarding and destruction of ships
- rpg quests on the islands
- breaking the locks of chests and doors
- the ability to change weapons and appearance of the character
- Perudo mini-game
- story cutscenes: voiceover + subtitles
- several endings of the game depending on the player's choices

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
